item.title: First article :information_desk_person:
item.description: A small message in the night to share my happy mood of having a new blog which does not seem so bad after all. And which allows me to create posts in a very simple way from R. Like that i’m showing you for example the very trendy viridis palette and what we call violin diagram (kind of boxplot but much more better). library(ggplot2) library(viridis) ## Warning: le package 'viridis' a été compilé avec la version R 3.
